name: Grand Hotel
overview: The Grand Hotel offers luxurious accommodations and top-notch amenities for discerning travelers.

rooms.name: Deluxe Room
rooms.description: Spacious room with king-sized bed and stunning views.

rooms.name: Executive Suite
rooms.description: Elegant suite with separate living area and whirlpool tub.

rooms.name: Penthouse
rooms.description: The ultimate in luxury with private balcony and butler service.

rooms.name: Standard Room
rooms.description: Comfortable room with queen-sized bed and all the essentials.

name: Beach Resort
overview: The Beach Resort is a tropical paradise with white sandy beaches and crystal clear waters.

rooms.name: Ocean View Suite
rooms.description: Spacious suite with stunning views of the ocean.

rooms.name: Cabana

rooms.name: Garden View Room

rooms.name: Standard Room
rooms.description: Comfortable room with all the essentials.

overview: The Mountain Lodge is a cozy retreat nestled in the heart of the mountains.

rooms.name: Standard Room

rooms.name: Family Room

name: City Center Hotel
overview: The City Center Hotel is located in the heart of the city, close to all the best shopping and dining.
